description: During the final battle with the Anti-Spirals, when dealing with larger Ashtanga, Simon channeled enough massive Spiral Energy, with aid from the spiral energy of those before Team Dai-Gurren to battle the Anti-Spiral, to merge the Arc-Gurren Lagann with the battleship and transform it into a humanoid shape, the Ultra Spiral Dreadnought Gunman Super Galaxy Gurren Lagann; this is similar to the method that created the Arc-Gurren Lagann.
name: Chouginga Gurren Lagann
